title: Reincubate Camo
desc: Use your iPhone as a pro webcam with powerful adjustments for Zoom, Meet, and more. Leave your webcam in the dust with hi-res streaming direct from its amazing cameras.

title: ShortLook
desc: ShortLook displays on your locked iPhone as you receive a notification using it's beautiful full screen design.

title: Mitsuha Forever
desc: Mitsuha also allows for visualizations below the lockscreen and homescreen.

title: Orion
desc: Orion combines hundreds of features in one place with highly customizable preferences, built to be very efficient and battery friendly.

title: WeatherGround
desc: WeatherGround is a tweak that brings weather to your fingertips!, Live weather background as wallpaper and Live weather effects on top of your current wallpaper.

title: Rofi
desc: Rofi is an app launcher tweak. Itâ€™s simple, easy to use, and accessible from everywhere!.

title: Dayn
desc: Dayn provides a completely new and more modern looking notification banner experience, while adding many new features in the process.
